name: fittingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is suitable or right for a particular situation or occasion: Fittingly, it was her uncle who sang at the funeral. The auction, organized by the fashion industry, included a number of fittingly stunning pieces of jewellery.
More examplesFewer examplesThe announcement of increased funding for the radio company was made, fittingly enough, on its flagship news programme.Fittingly, for a woman who was such a creative designer, the decorations for her surprise party were eye-catching.
